answerText: The Master of Go [or Meijin][10] The Master of Go is by this Japanese author who wrote about the relationship between Shimamura and the geisha Komako at a hot spring in Snow Country.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Illinois A + Dorman A + Wellesley | 8 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel's character of Otake is based on Minoru Kitani. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this novel in which the journalist Uragami chronicles the retirement match of Honinbo Shusai.
